verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I heard an old, old story how a Savior came from glory, How He gave His life on Calvary to save a wretch like me; I heard about His groaning, of His precious bloodâ€™s atoning, Then I repented of my sins and won the victory

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: O victory in Jesus, my Savior, forever! He sought me and bought me with His redeeming blood; He loved me ere I knew Him, and all my love is due Him. He plunged me to victory beneath the cleansing flood

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I heard about His healing, of His cleansing power revealing. How He made the lame to walk again and caused the blind to see; And then I cried, "Dear Jesus, come and heal my broken spirit," And somehow Jesus came and brought to me the victory.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I heard about a mansion He has built for me in glory. And I heard about the streets of gold beyond the crystal sea; About the angels singing and the old redemption story, And some sweet day I'll sing up there the song of victory.
